spell_tooltip.description: Heals the friendly target for 317,750, then jumps up to 15 yards to heal the 4 most injured nearby allies. Healing is reduced by 30% with each jump.
Heals the friendly target for 314,910, then jumps up to 15 yards to heal the 4 most injured nearby allies. Healing is reduced by 30% with each jump.
Heals the friendly target for 317,738, then jumps up to 15 yards to heal the 4 most injured nearby allies. Healing is reduced by 30% with each jump.
Hurls molten lava at the target, dealing 366,376 Fire damage. Lava Burst will always critically strike if the target is affected by Flame Shock.
Hurls molten lava at the target, dealing 370,885 Fire damage. Lava Burst will always critically strike if the target is affected by Flame Shock.
Hurls molten lava at the target, dealing 372,584 Fire damage. Lava Burst will always critically strike if the target is affected by Flame Shock.
Shift partially into the elemental planes, taking 40% less damage for 12 sec.
Hurls a lightning bolt at the enemy, dealing 263,769 Nature damage and then jumping to additional nearby enemies. Affects 3 total targets.

Protects the target with an earthen shield, increasing your healing on them by 20% and healing them for 94,506 when they take damage. This heal can only occur once every 3 sec. Maximum 9 charges.

Earth Shield can only be placed on the Shaman and one other target at a time. The Shaman can have up to two Elemental Shields active on them.
Disrupts the target's concentration with a burst of wind, interrupting spellcasting and preventing any spell in that school from being cast for 2 sec.
Reduces the cooldown of Astral Shift by 30 sec.
Ghost Wolf removes snares and increases your movement speed by an additional 25% for the first 3 sec. May only occur once every 20 sec.

Increases the number of Elemental Shields you can have active on yourself by 1.

You can have Earth Shield on yourself and one ally at the same time.
Summons a totem at the target location that gathers electrical energy from the surrounding air and explodes after 2 sec, stunning all enemies within 9 yards for 3 sec.
A gust of wind hurls you forward.
Maximum health increased by 10%, and while you are at full health, Reincarnation cools down 75% faster.

Calls forth a Greater Earth Elemental to protect you and your allies for 1 min.

While this elemental is active, your maximum health is increased by 15%.

Healing from Healing Stream Totem reduces Fire, Frost, and Nature damage taken by 6% for 3 sec.

Healing from Cloudburst Totem reduces Fire, Frost, and Nature damage taken by 3% for 3 sec.
When your health is brought below 35%, you instantly heal for 20% of your maximum health. Cannot occur more than once every 45 sec.
Increases the critical strike chance of your Nature spells and abilities by 4%.
Your Healing Surge is 25% more effective on yourself.
Reduces all magic damage taken by 6%.
Summons a totem at the target location for 18 sec, continually granting all allies who pass within 11 yards 40% increased movement speed for 5 sec.
Calls upon the guidance of the spirits for 15 sec, permitting movement while casting Shaman spells. Castable while casting. Increases movement speed by 20%.
Calls down a bolt of lightning, dealing 14,798 Nature damage to all enemies within 10 yards, reducing their movement speed by 40% for 5 sec, and knocking them upward. Usable while stunned.

Increases the radius of your totem effects by 15%.

Increases the duration of your Earthbind and Earthgrab Totems by 10 sec.

Increases the duration of your Healing Stream, Tremor, Poison Cleansing, Ancestral Protection, Earthen Wall, and Wind Rush Totems by 3.0 sec.
The effects of your weapon and shield imbues are increased by 20%.
Reduces the cooldown of Spiritwalker's Grace by 30 sec and increases your movement speed by 20% while it is active.
Relocates your active totems to the specified location.
Reduces the cooldown of your totems by 6 sec.
Interrupting a spell with Wind Shear decreases your damage taken from that spell school by 15% for 18 sec. Stacks up to 2 times.
Thunderstorm knocks enemies up instead of away and its cooldown is reduced by 5 sec.
Summons a totem at your feet that removes all Poison effects from a nearby party or raid member within 34 yards every 1.5 sec for 9 sec.
Resets the cooldown of your most recently used totem with a base cooldown shorter than 3 minutes.
Your next healing or damaging Nature spell is instant cast and costs no mana.
Summons a totem at your feet that grants you an absorb shield preventing 3.4 million damage for 15 sec, and an additional 346,367 every 5 sec for 30 sec.
Restorative waters wash over a friendly target, healing them for 339,874 and an additional 166,950 over 18 sec.
Blanket the target area in healing rains, restoring 331,901 health to up to 5 allies over 10 sec.
Healing Wave, Healing Surge, and Chain Heal heal for an additional 15% on targets affected by your Healing Rain or Riptide.
Deal 83,686 Nature damage every 1 sec to up to 5 enemies inside of your Healing Rain.

Summons a totem at your feet for 10 sec, which pulses every 1.7 sec, healing all party or raid members within 46 yards for 186933.3.

Healing reduced beyond 5 targets.

Casting Riptide grants 2 stacks of Tidal Waves. Tidal Waves reduces the cast time of your next Healing Wave or Chain Heal by 20%, or increases the critical effect chance of your next Healing Surge by 30%.
Targets you heal with Healing Wave, Healing Surge, Chain Heal, or Riptide's initial heal gain 10% increased health for 10 sec.
Your direct heal criticals refund a percentage of your maximum mana: 0.80% from Healing Wave, 0.48% from Healing Surge or Riptide, and 0.20% from Chain Heal.
Consuming Tidal Waves has a chance to reduce the cooldown of your Healing Stream, Cloudburst, Healing Tide, Mana Tide, and Poison Cleansing totems by 3.0 sec.
Your critical heals have 215% effectiveness instead of the usual 200%.

Summons a totem at the target location for 6 sec, which reduces damage taken by all party and raid members within 11 yards by 15%. Immediately and every 1 sec, the health of all affected players is redistributed evenly.

Casting Lava Burst increases the healing of your next Healing Surge by 30%, stacking up to 2 times.

Healing Surge applies Flame Shock to a nearby enemy when empowered by Master of the Elements.
Healing Stream Totem heals for 100% more, decaying over its duration.
Riptide's initial heal is increased 20% and has a 10% increased critical strike chance.
Reduces the cooldown of Healing Tide Totem by 45 sec.
Spirit Link Totem reduces damage taken by an additional 5%, and it restores 840,518 health to all nearby allies 1 second after it is dropped. Healing reduced beyond 5 targets.
Chain Heal bounces an additional time and its healing is increased by 8%.
Every third Healing Wave or Healing Surge heals for an additional 50%.
Riptide and Lava Burst have an additional charge.

Imbue your weapon with the element of Earth for 1 hour. Your Riptide, Healing Wave, Healing Surge, and Chain Heal healing a 20% chance to trigger Earthliving on the target, healing for 215,138 over 9 sec.

Transform into a Water Ascendant, duplicating all healing you deal at 70% effectiveness for 15 sec and immediately healing for 942,671. Ascendant healing is distributed evenly among allies within 40 yds.
Earth Shield reduces damage taken by 3% and its healing is increased by up to 150% as its target's health decreases. Maximum benefit is reached below 50% health.
The cooldown of Ascendance is reduced by 60 sec.

When you heal with your Healing Wave, Healing Surge, or Riptide you have a 30% chance to summon an Ancestral spirit to aid you, instantly healing an injured friendly party or raid target within 40 yards for 50% of the amount healed. Critical strikes increase this chance to 60%.

Casting Surging Totem has a 100% chance to activate Downpour, allowing you to cast Downpour within 22 sec.

 Downpour
A burst of water at your Surging Totem's location heals up to 5 injured allies within 12 yards for 478,222 and increases their maximum health by 10% for 6 sec.
Every 1 million mana you spend brings a High Tide, making your next 2 Chain Heals heal for an additional 10% and not reduce with each jump.

Casting Riptide has a 7% chance to activate Ascendance for 6.0 sec.

 Ascendance
Transform into a Water Ascendant, duplicating all healing you deal at 70% effectiveness for 15 sec and immediately healing for 949,674. Ascendant healing is distributed evenly among allies within 40 yds.

Chain Heal now jumps to a nearby totem within 23 yards once it reaches its last target, causing the totem to cast Chain Heal on an injured ally within 30 yards for 157,741. Jumps to 2 nearby targets within 23 yards.
Surging Totem heals for 150% more during Ascendance.
When you summon a Healing Tide Totem, Healing Stream Totem, Cloudburst Totem, Mana Tide Totem, or Spirit Link Totem you cast a free instant Chain Heal at 100% effectiveness.

Successfully removing a harmful effect with Tremor Totem or Poison Cleansing Totem, or controlling an enemy with Capacitor Totem or Earthgrab Totem reduces the cooldown of the totem used by 5 sec.

Cannot occur more than once every 20 sec per totem.
If you have a totem active, your totem grants you a shield absorbing 558,081 damage for 30 sec every 30 sec.

Your Healing Stream Totems now also heals a second ally at 50% effectiveness. 

Cloudburst Totem stores 25% additional healing.
Increases the duration of your Earthliving effect by 3 sec.

Learn a new weapon imbue, Tidecaller's Guard.

 Tidecaller's Guard
Imbue your shield with the element of Water for 1 hour. Your healing done is increased by 2.4% and the duration of your Healing Stream Totem and Cloudburst Totem is increased by 3.6 sec.
Allies affected by your Earthen Wall Totem, Ancestral Protection Totem, and Earthliving effect receive 15% increased healing from you.

Elemental motes orbit around your Surging Totem. Your abilities consume the motes for enhanced effects. 

Water: Your next Healing Wave or Healing Surge also heals an ally inside of your Healing Rain at 100% effectiveness.

Air: The cast time of your next healing spell is reduced by 40%.

Earth: Your next Chain Heal applies Earthliving at 150% effectiveness to all targets hit.

 Tidecaller's Guard

Allies affected by your Earthen Wall Totem, Ancestral Protection Totem, and Earthliving effect receive 15% increased healing from you.

Hurls molten lava at the target, dealing 367,740 Fire damage. Lava Burst will always critically strike if the target is affected by Flame Shock.
Hurls molten lava at the target, dealing 372,409 Fire damage. Lava Burst will always critically strike if the target is affected by Flame Shock.
Hurls molten lava at the target, dealing 370,307 Fire damage. Lava Burst will always critically strike if the target is affected by Flame Shock.
Hurls a lightning bolt at the enemy, dealing 267,742 Nature damage and then jumping to additional nearby enemies. Affects 3 total targets.
Hurls a lightning bolt at the enemy, dealing 265,382 Nature damage and then jumping to additional nearby enemies. Affects 3 total targets.
Hurls a lightning bolt at the enemy, dealing 267,702 Nature damage and then jumping to additional nearby enemies. Affects 3 total targets.
Instantly shocks the target with concussive force, causing 531,950 Nature damage.

Causes the earth within 8 yards of your target to tremble and break, dealing 259,775 Physical damage over 6 sec and has a 5% chance to knock the enemy down. Multiple uses of Earthquake may overlap.

This spell is cast at your target.
Your damaging critical strikes deal 250% damage instead of the usual 200%.

Calls forth a Greater Fire Elemental to rain destruction on your enemies for 20 sec. 

While the Fire Elemental is active, Flame Shock deals damage 
33% faster, and newly applied Flame Shocks last 100% longer.
Earth Shock, Elemental Blast, and Earthquake have a 25% chance to refund all Maelstrom spent.
Riptide and Lava Burst have an additional charge.

Charge yourself with lightning, causing your next 2 Lightning Bolts to deal 150% more damage, and also causes your next 2 Lightning Bolts or Chain Lightnings to be instant cast and trigger an Elemental Overload on every target.
Casting Lava Burst increases the damage or healing of your next Nature or Frost spell by 15%.
Shift partially into the elemental planes, taking 40% less damage for 12 sec.
Hurls a lightning bolt at the enemy, dealing 267,792 Nature damage and then jumping to additional nearby enemies. Affects 3 total targets.
Hurls a lightning bolt at the enemy, dealing 260,317 Nature damage and then jumping to additional nearby enemies. Affects 3 total targets.
Hurls a lightning bolt at the enemy, dealing 262,199 Nature damage and then jumping to additional nearby enemies. Affects 3 total targets.

When you deal damage with a melee weapon, you have a chance to gain Maelstrom Weapon, stacking up to 5 times. Each stack of Maelstrom Weapon reduces the cast time of your next damage or healing spell by 20%.

A maximum of 5 stacks of Maelstrom Weapon can be consumed at a time.

When you deal damage with a melee weapon, you have a chance to gain Maelstrom Weapon, stacking up to 5 times. Each stack of Maelstrom Weapon reduces the cast time of your next damage or healing spell by 20%.

A maximum of 5 stacks of Maelstrom Weapon can be consumed at a time.

When you deal damage with a melee weapon, you have a chance to gain Maelstrom Weapon, stacking up to 5 times. Each stack of Maelstrom Weapon reduces the cast time of your next damage or healing spell by 20%.

A maximum of 5 stacks of Maelstrom Weapon can be consumed at a time.
Imbue your main-hand weapon with the element of Wind for 1 hour. Each main-hand attack has a 30% chance to trigger two extra attacks, dealing 8,327 Physical damage each.

Charges your off-hand weapon with lava and burns your target, dealing 23,248 Fire damage.

Damage is increased by 100% if your offhand weapon is imbued with Flametongue Weapon.
Windfury causes each successive Windfury attack within 15 sec to increase the damage of Windfury by 15%, stacking up to 5 times.
Maelstrom Weapon now increases the damage of spells it affects by 20% per stack and the healing of spells it affects by 20% per stack.
Lava Lash cooldown reduced by 6.0 sec, and if Lava Lash is used against a target affected by your Flame Shock, Flame Shock will be spread to up to 5 nearby enemies.
Windfury Weapon has a 100% chance to trigger a third attack.

Maelstrom Weapon can now stack 5 additional times, and Maelstrom Weapon now increases the damage of spells it affects by an additional 5% per stack and the healing of spells it affects by an additional 5% per stack.

Unleash a devastating storm around yourself, dealing 20,682 Stormstrike damage every 1 sec to nearby enemies for 8 sec.

Increases your chance to activate Windfury Weapon by 200%, and the damage of Windfury Weapon by 10%.
Your damage or healing spells will now consume up to 10 Maelstrom Weapon stacks.
Increase the chance for Mastery: Enhanced Elements to trigger Windfury and Stormsurge by 150%.

Electrocutes all enemies in front of you, dealing 25,076 Nature damage. Hitting 2 or more targets enhances your weapons for 12 sec, causing Stormstrike, Ice Strike, and Lava Lash to also deal 7,491 Nature damage to all targets in front of you. Damage reduced beyond 6 targets.

Stormstrike has an additional charge.

Stormsurge now also causes your next Stormstrike to deal 25% additional damage as Nature damage, stacking up to 2 times.
Each active weapon imbue Increases all Fire, Frost, and Nature damage dealt by 5.0%.
Each target hit by Crash Lightning increases the damage of your next Stormstrike by 25%, up to a maximum of 6 stacks.

Crash Lightning damage increased by 40%.

Chain Lightning now jumps to 2 extra targets.
